title: NeuralVision
description: An advanced computer vision system for real-time object detection and classification with 99.3% accuracy using custom transformer architecture.

title: SmartTextAI
description: Natural language processing library for semantic text analysis, summarization, and generation using transformer models.

title: MLOps Pipeline Framework
description: End-to-end framework for automating machine learning workflows from training to deployment with monitoring and versioning.

title: AI Ethics Toolkit
description: Open-source library for evaluating bias, fairness, and transparency in machine learning models.
